channel.title: true stories on J Jones
channel.description: Recent content in true stories on J Jones

item.title: Customers Lie
item.description: You don’t want to admit it, but you know that it’s true. Sometimes, it is not even intentional and just happens. We also tend to call them “mistakes” to soften everyones’ feels. You do it, I do it, everyone does it. Let’s talk about it.

item.title: When The Chips Fall
item.description: There are tales we all can tell of times when things have went oh, so right, and then became a tragic tale of events that turned oh, so wrong. The levels of wrong are relative, but when you have to dust off and polish your resume on short notice, you know you’ve screwed up. This is that story.
